mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, p.* from (select * from payment join product using (product_no) join product_img using (img_no) where customer = #{userId} and status in (1,2) and delete_yn = 'N' order by review_status asc, payment_no desc) p) where rnum between #{start} and #{last}
select count(*) from payment where customer = #{userId} and status in (1,2)

select * from (select rownum rnum, p.* from (select * from review join payment using(payment_no) where review.product_no = #{productNo} order by review_date desc) p) where rnum between #{start} and #{last}
select count(*) from review where product_no = #{pno}
